definition.name: Nrwl Nx
definition.description: Wrap the Nx monorepo tool and execute tasks depending on the action context
definition.author: Mansa Group

inputs.name: targets
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of targets to execute

inputs.name: projects
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of projects to use

inputs.name: all
inputs.description: Run the targets on all projects

inputs.name: affected
inputs.description: Use the Nx' affected subcommand to only process affected projects

inputs.name: parallel
inputs.description: Number of tasks to execute in parallel (can be expensive)

inputs.name: args
inputs.description: Optional arguments to append to the Nx command

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.description: Path to the Nx workspace, needed if not the repository root
